pages.text: 39|48|tatha khul jaayengee unake lie unake karatooton kee buraeeyaan aur unhen gher lega, jisaka ve upahaas kar rahe the.

39|49|aur jab pahunchata hai manushyon ko koee duhkh, to hamen pukaarata hai. phir jab ham pradaan karate hain koee sukh apanee or se, to kahata haih ye to mujhe pradaan kiya gaya hai gyaan ke kaaran. balki, ye ek pareeksha hai. kintu, logon mein se adhiktar (ise) nahin jaanate.
39|50|yahee baat, un logon ne bhee kahee thee, jo inase poorv the. to nahin kaam aaya unake, jo kuchh ve kama rahe the.
39|51|phir aa pade unapar unake sab kukarm aur jo atyaachaar kiye hain inamen se, aa padenge unapar (bhee) unake kukarm tatha ve (hamen) vivash karane vaale nahin hain.

39|52|kya unhen gyaan nahin ki allaah phailaata hai jeevika, jisake lie chaahata hai tatha naapakar deta hai (jisake lie chaahata hai)? nishchay isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain, un logon ke lie, jo eemaan rakhate hain.

39|53|aap kah den mere un bhakton se, jinhonne apane oopar atyaachaar kiye hain ki tum niraash[1] na ho allaah kee daya se. vaastav mein, allaah kshama kar deta hai sab paapon ko. nishchay vah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai.
39|54|tatha jhuk pado apane paalanahaar kee or aur aagyaakaaree ho jao usake, isase poorv ki tumapar yaatana aa jaaye, phir tumhaaree sahaayata na kee jaaye.
39|55|tatha paalan karo us sarvottam (qaraan) ka, jo avatarit kiya gaya hai tumhaaree or tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se, isase poorv ki aa pade tumapar yaatana aur tumhen gyaan na ho.
39|56|(aisa na ho ki) koee vyakti kahe ki haay santaap! is baat par ki main aalasy kiya allaah ke paksh mein tatha main upahaas karane vaalon mein rah gaya.
